works.complaint:
I have signed up for Google Ad Sense to earn
commission  
on advertisements being placed on  my blog ad my application was rejected,
 
however I have noticed that there are a number of different advertisement 

banners and highlighted words on my blog, I have not authorised this and I
 
am not gaining commission off them, and I do not know where they have come
 
from. I am emailing to clarify who these advertisements belong to and why 

they are featuring on my blog without my permission.
